com.verymuchme.appconfig

Class Log4jHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.verymuchme.appconfig.Log4jHelper

  • public class Log4jHelper
extends Object
    Get rid of those pesky Log4j warnings because of missing Log4j configuration info for certain packages. Probably should only be used for testing.
    Since:
    1.2
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Tracy Flynn

      • loadLog4jConfiguration

        public static boolean loadLog4jConfiguration(List<String> configNames,
                             org.slf4j.Logger loggerContext)
        Load log4j configuration from a configuration file. For a given name, load only the first file in the list that is found
        Parameters:
        configNames - List of possible configuration file names
        loggerContext - logger context in which to log loading messages
        Returns:
        true if configuration found and loaded, false otherwise
